title: Is PGDAV College (Evening) good in terms of its people and atmosphere? - Quora
tags: Pannalal Girdharlal Dayanand Anglo Vedic, University of Delhi

response.answer_text: If you have last choice then you admission in PGDAV otherwise atmosphere of college is not good but if you are interesting in studies , ECA such theater acting , singing , drama etc then is good for you and also one think sports department is develop in previous year so it will be a better choice for you .
